context.p: There are instances where you might want to reserve or lock a floating license. For example, you could lock a floating license if you want to use your floating license offline while traveling.
To reserve/lock a floating license, follow these steps:

step.cmd:
Select Lock floating license from the Help menuPreferences dialog box (go to Window (Eclipse on Mac OSX) and choose Preferences
.

step.stepresult: Your floating license is now locked. You can use the same action to unlock the license or you can contact your system administrator to unlock it.
